name: Stinrix
description:
This is Yellow Wolf Productions and we have a new game going on in this year 2020. Welcome to Stinrix! This game is still not stable so expect a few changes after this version.

October 22, 1994

You're a female reporter who decided to visit and get any evidences in a dead serial killer's dangerous place to show to all the people what have that serial killer did with his life and also how he built his robot, but you also have been watched by Stinrix.

Current Version: Full version 1.1

V1.1 Contains:
(Minor Update)

New things and changes:
• There are new scenes in the game.
• A little longer playtime.
• At the serial killer’s house and at the female detective’s apartment, we’ve added more furnitures to make it more decorated.
• Added creepy background noises.
• The whole story mode has changed.
• Added TV, and VCR feature. (Now you can get some use of that VHS Cassette.)
• Added more new other features and sounds.
• Added credits.
• Added crouch possibility.
• We’ve added a new function for the resume game button.

Fixes:
• The game is now more demanding, and a bit more optimized.
• Doors’ animations has been fixed. (There was a problem with the whole doors’ animation. When you’ve constantly pressed the ’LMB’ at a door, it freezed and you couldn’t actually open it.)
• Fixed some sounds.
• Fixed mouse sensitivity.
• Fixed papercode’s position (Now you don’t have to get through the table).

Please report bugs, if you found any!
